scripts.ship:patch: npm run release:patch && (git push --follow-tags || true) && npm run push && npm run version:gas
scripts.ship:minor: npm run release:minor && (git push --follow-tags || true) && npm run push && npm run version:gas
scripts.ship:major: npm run release:major && (git push --follow-tags || true) && npm run push && npm run version:gas
